Name: Mines of Mars
About the game: Some suspected that Mars once harbored life. There was a reason that it wasn't ever found. Mines of Mars is a procedural atmospheric mining game that is inspired by games like Metroid and Motherload. It is also a story based adventure game with dark secrets, great weapons, tons of different items, and a gorgeous world to explore. The world of MoM is procedurally created, so that every time you play it, it will be a little different. There are tons of different enemies, dark corridors, and a large variety of fauna and ambient creatures. -Huge Procedurally generated underground world -Night and Day system -Dark secrets -Atmospheric vibes -3 Mini Games -Original Ambient Soundtrack by Evan Gipson -Lots of flora and fauna -Tons of Weapons and Items -Great storyline -Gravity Mining! -Huge Bosses Follow us for the latest info and game news! • -games/ • •
